title: Ask the Builder: Artificial intelligence and contractor quotes
description: I talked with Irene on the phone a few days ago. She lives in Connecticut and used my affordable phone coaching service. She needed to make sure the bid she received to repair wood rot next to her front door was reasonable. Irene was about to have a new front door installed. At the end of the call, Irene said: “Oh my, investing in this phone call was the best thing to do. I now feel comfortable that I’m not getting ripped off!”

title: As Trump eyes Greenland, former aide pushes for billion-dollar AI data center in Arctic Island - Here's all we know
description: Aiming to reach 300 MW operation by mid-2027 and expand to 1.5 GW by 2028-end, the Greenland AI data centre is being positioned as the solution to world's artificial intelligence expansion related power requirements.
content:

title: AI-designed NLRP3 inhibitor receives FDA clearance for Parkinson disease trials
description: Insilico Medicine (3696.HK), a clinical-stage drug discovery and development company driven by generative artificial intelligence (AI), today announced that ISM8969, an orally available NLRP3 inhibitor targeting inflammation and neurodegenerative disorders, has recently received investigational new drug (IND) clearance from the U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA), intended for the treatment of Parkinson's Disease.

title: Federal Reserve Meeting and Major Tech Earnings to Drive Market Focus Amid Geopolitical Uncertainty
description: The Federal Reserve is expected to hold interest rates steady on Wednesday after three quarter-point cuts in 2025, while major technology companies including Apple, Microsoft, Meta, and Tesla prepare to report earnings. S&P 500 earnings are projected to grow 9.1% in Q4 and over 15% in 2026, with investors particularly focused on returns from artificial intelligence investments. Markets recovered from earlier volatility related to Greenland trade tensions, with 81% of reporting companies beating earnings estimates so far.
